DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare efficacy levosimendan dobutamine patient unstable hemodynamics ( shock ) .
DOC.criteria: Reduced leave ventricular systolic function Hypotension Anuria oligouria Less 18 year old Pregnant Uncorrected valvular stenosis Hypertrophic obstructive cardiomyopathy ( HOCM ) Third degree AV block
